channel.title: CV on Johan Larsson
channel.description: Recent content in CV on Johan Larsson

item.title: CV
item.description: Education Degrees 2018 Bachelor’s degree in statistics, Lund University I developed an algorithm for creating area-proportional Euler diagrams using ellipses. This work also resulted in a conference paper and oral presentation at the SetWR conference in Edinburgh. 2015 – 2017 Master’s degree in medical science with a major in physical therapy, Lund University In my masters thesis I design and piloted a randomized controlled trial. 2011 – 2014 Bachelor’s degree in Physical Therapy, Lund University For my bachelor thesis, me and my co-author traveled to Tokyo to interview physical therapists about their professional role and use of technology.
